Hi,

I have been trying to do a test run using junit on
Eclipse platform. I followed the instructions on the 
Eclipse documentation document, and just created the
following code.
import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;

/*
 * Created on Aug 29, 2003
 *
 * To change the template for this generated file go
to
 * Window>Preferences>Java>Code
Generation>Code and Comments
 */

/**
 * @author pnivargi
 *
 * To change the template for this generated type
comment go to
 * Window>Preferences>Java>Code
Generation>Code and Comments
 */
public class TestFailure extends TestCase {

	/**
	 * Constructor for TestFailure.
	 * @param arg0
	 */
	public TestFailure(String arg0) {
		super(arg0);
	}
	

}


But following are the errors that I am getting on
compiling and running.


Error			TestSuiteLoader cannot be resolved (or is not
a valid return type) for the method getLoader
TestRunner.java	JUnit/junit/textui	line 49

Error			StandardTestSuiteLoader cannot be resolved or
is not a type	TestRunner.java	JUnit/junit/textui	line
50

Error			The method addListener(TestListener) in the
type TestResult is not applicable for the arguments
(TestRunner)	TestRunner.java	JUnit/junit/textui	line
70

Error			The method elapsedTimeAsString(long) is
undefined for the type TestRunner	TestRunner.java
JUnit/junit/textui	line 76

Error			The method getFilteredTrace(Throwable) is
undefined for the type TestRunner	TestRunner.java
JUnit/junit/textui	line 141


Error			The method getFilteredTrace(Throwable) is
undefined for the type TestRunner	TestRunner.java
JUnit/junit/textui	line 159

Error			The method extractClassName(String) is
undefined for the type TestRunner	TestRunner.java
JUnit/junit/textui	line 220

Error			Version cannot be resolved	TestRunner.java
JUnit/junit/textui	line 222

Error			The method getTest(String) is undefined for
the type TestRunner	TestRunner.java	JUnit/junit/textui
line 231
Task	Not Completed	Normal	TODO Auto-generated
constructor stub	MyTestCase.java	JUnit/test	line 28
Task	Not Completed	Normal	TODO Auto-generated method
stub	MyTestCase.java	JUnit/test	line 35
Task	Not Completed	Normal	TODO Auto-generated method
stub	MyTestCase.java	JUnit/test	line 44
Warning			The import junit.framework.Test is never
used	TestFailure.java	JUnitTest	line 1

Does anybody know why it is so?

Thanks,
Prajakta
